name: Fireflies (itch) (Lux_99)
description:
Game informasjon

Fireflies is a VR narrative-driven puzzle game.

The story is focused around 19 year old Keira, who has struggled throughout her life and developed anxiety and depression as a result. 

Now she finds herself trapped inside a dark and twisted mind palace, that she now has to escape. 

Fireflies that represent Keira’s psyche guide her through this eerie world and make her see the world differently. Three of them will talk to her in the voices of people close to her.

Progress Informasjon 

So far we have gotten much of the pre-production done and the build has gone into a full "proof of concept". 

Much of the ground coding is in place and the level is ready to get assets. Lighting is still a bit up in the air, but definitely getting somewhere.

All puzzles have been planned and as soon as assets and coding is ready, they are as good as done.

On the narrative side, a script is ready and voice actors have been cast.

All in all we think we are on good way and hopeful about our project.
